oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Littlefield & Steere Co. postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Made by Curt Teich & Company, Chicago
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Littlefield & Steere Co., Knoxville, Tenn. Manufacturers Red Seal Candies. Color postcard. Shows Littlefield & Steere Company Building with sign and U.S. flag; Clinch Avenue Viaduct with traffic in foreground. Made by Curt Teich & Company, Chicago.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Candy; Buildings; Flags; Bridges;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
